name: Infinite Drop [FREE][GAME]
description:
Your a master thief in the year 3842 who has just stolen an ancient relic, the Golden Gauntlet. When you try on your loot you find yourself falling through a a seemingly infinite crystal abyss. The gauntlet draws you towards something, but the Space Police are still after you.

Move:  WASD or ARROW KEYS

Attack: SPACE KEY

Bomb (Clears room): ENTER or SHIFT

Note:  Player can HOLD ATTACK key to CHARGE up their PUNCH. Player is invulnerable while punching (not charging).  Charging up punch makes the punch last longer.  Break blue crystals for rewards

This game is mostly a prototype. Hopefully can get more kinds of obstacles and enemies in there.
